item.title: [Template] Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. 測試中文 The <code>emojify</code> function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes . To enable emoji globally, set enableEmoji to true in your site’s configuration and then you can type emoji shorthand codes directly in content files; e.g. 🙈 :see_no_evil: 🙉 :hear_no_evil: 🙊 :speak_no_evil: The Emoji cheat sheet is a useful reference for emoji shorthand codes.

item.title: [Template] Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: [Template] Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: [Template] Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: About Me
item.description: 嗨 👋，我是江詠筑，熱愛跨領域學習與設計思考的未來網頁開發工程師，期望能創造使用者友善的藝術品。 🌱 我目前是 清華大學資訊應用研究所 (NTHU ISA) 碩一研究生，已經修完畢業學分，正在 自然語言處理實驗室 @ NLPLab 學習自然語言處理知識，尤其專研關於詞義消岐(word sense disambiguation)、生成式人工智慧(generative AI)、大型語言模型(Large Language Model)在英文教學工具上的應用。 📄 我的簡介：中文履歷 / 英文履歷 。 👨‍💻 我的一些專案可在 我的 GitHub 頁面 上看到。 💬 歡迎問我關於 為什麼跨領域學習、推甄研究所。 ⚡ 趣聞：我愛瑜伽 🧘‍♀️和狗狗 🐕 有經營 youtube, instagram 的興趣，最近喜歡上寫 thread 文章，分享生活反思與有趣的小事情。 🌱 I’m currently postgraduate student at NTHU ISA @NLPLab 📄 Check out about my experiences : Chinese Resume / English Resume 👨‍💻 Some of my projects are available on my github page 📝 I seldom write articles on my website 💬 Ask me about how to engage in interdisciplinary learning

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
